content: मधु {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (धु|ध्वी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [मन्यत इति मधु, मन्-उ नस्य धः <ls>Uṇ. 1. 18</ls>] Sweet, pleasant, agreeable, delightful. {%--<ab>n.</ab>%} (धु) {@--1@} Honey; एतास्ता मधुनो धाराश्च्यातति सविषास्त्वयि <ls>U. 3. 34</ls>; मधु तिष्ठति जिह्वाग्रे हृदये तु हलाहलम्. {@--2@} The juice or nectar of flowers; <ls>Ku. 3. 36</ls>; देहि मुखकमलमधुपानं <ls>Gīt. 10.</ls> {@--3@} A sweet intoxicating drink, wine, spirituous liquor; विनयंते स्म तद्योधा मधुभिर्विजयश्रमं <ls>R. 4. 65</ls>; <ls>Rs. 1. 3.</ls> {@--4@} Water. {@--5@} Sugar. {@--6@} Sweetness. {@--7@} Anything sweet. {@--8@} <ab>Ved.</ab> Soma juice. {@--9@} Milk or anything produced from milk (<ab>Ved.</ab>). {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} (धुः) {@--1@} The spring or vernal season; मधुरया मधुबोधितमाधवी <ls>Śi. 6. 20</ls>; क्व नु ते हृदयंगमः सखा कुसुमायोजितकार्मुको मधुः <ls>Ku. 4. 24</ls>, <ls n="Ku. 4.">25</ls>; <ls n="Ku.">3. 10</ls>, <ls n="Ku. 3.">30.</ls> {@--2@} The month of Chaitra; भास्करस्य मधुमाधवाविव <ls>R. 11. 7</ls>; मासे मधौ मधुरकोकिलभृंगनादै रामा हरंति हृदयं प्रसभं नराणां <ls>Rs. 6. 25.</ls> {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of a demon killed by Viṣṇu. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of another demon, father of Rāvaṇa and killed by Śatrughna. {@--5@} The Aśoka tree. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of king Kārtavīrya.
